poem:
"Upon the Reveal of Ironman's Stage Venture"

Downey Jr strides,
from silver screen to stage,
a thespian's dive.
McNeal, the scribe in 
weighty struggle,
against familial ties and 
novel tug-of-war,
old hatreds,
a twisted fascination—
artificial intelligence.

Startling, savory as plums,
wickedly smart—
on Broadway, a new art.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Robert Downey Jr to make Broadway debut this year Robert Downey Jr is set to make his Broadway debut in a new play from Pulitzer prize winner Ayad Akhtar. The Oscar-winning actor will play the lead in McNeal, the story of a writer struggling with “an estranged son, a new novel, old axes to grind and an unhealthy fascination with artificial intelligence”. It’s described as “startling and wickedly smart”. McNeal will play at the Lincoln". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Robert Downey Jr to make Broadway debut this year Robert Downey Jr is set to make his Broadway debut in a new play from Pulitzer prize winner Ayad Akhtar. The Oscar-winning actor will play the lead in McNeal, the story of a writer struggling with “an estranged son, a new novel, old axes to grind and an unhealthy fascination with artificial intelligence”. It’s described as “startling and wickedly smart”. McNeal will play at the Lincoln
